intro: Ixora potaroensis, commonly known as the Potaro ixora, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 12,000 species of flowering plants. Ixora potaroensis thrives in warm, humid climates and is often found in lowland tropical forests.
